subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=돌|eumhun=|rv=dol|mr=tol|y=tol}}

# [[dash]], [[clash]], eg., [[돌격]], [[돌진]], [[충돌]]
# [[protrusion]], eg., [[돌기]], [[돌출]]
# [[flue]], [[chimney]], eg., [[온돌]], [[연돌]]
# [[penetration]], [[piercing]], eg., [[돌파]], [[연돌]]
# [[fierce]] [[horse]], eg., perhaps [[돌궐]]
# [[sudden]], eg., [[돌발]], [[돌변]], [[돌연]], [[돌풍]]
